== OpenHandle Smalltalk Code Examples ==

OK, this is very experimental. Not tried but looks promising. See the blog [http://blogs.corriga.net/giovanni/ Jazz Programming], and these posts: [http://blogs.corriga.net/giovanni/archives/2007/7/3/restful_web_services_example_215/ RESTful Web Services Example 2.15 - Yahoo! News Search w/ JSON] and the earlier post for XML, [http://blogs.corriga.net/giovanni/archives/2007/6/28/restful_web_services_example_21/ RESTful Web Services Example 2.1 - Yahoo! Web Search]


{{{
% cat handler.st
doHandle: aHandle
    | baseURI document term json |
    ""
    baseURI := 'http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle'.
    term := aHandle encodeForHTTP.
    json := Curl new getContentsUrl: baseURI , '?format=json&id=' , term.
    h := Json readFrom: json readStream.
    ((h at: #handleValues) do:
        [:value |
        Transcript
            show: (value at: #index) printString;
            cr.
        Transcript
            show: (value at: #type) printString;
            cr.
        Transcript
            show: (value at: #data) printString;
            cr.
        ]
}}}
